leftovers.name: Leftovers

life_orb.description: Boosts damage by 30% but causes 10% recoil

choice_specs.name: Choice Specs
choice_specs.description: Boosts Special Attack by 50% but locks into first move used

choice_scarf.name: Choice Scarf
choice_scarf.description: Boosts Speed by 50% but locks into first move used

focus_sash.name: Focus Sash

air_balloon.name: Air Balloon

safety_goggles.description: Immune to weather damage and powder moves

assault_vest.description: Boosts Special Defense by 50% but can only use attacking moves

eviolite.name: Eviolite

white_herb.name: White Herb

mental_herb.name: Mental Herb
mental_herb.description: Cures infatuation when inflicted (one time use)

lum_berry.name: Lum Berry

sitrus_berry.name: Sitrus Berry
